heroData.caption: Progressive web app
heroData.subTitle: PWAs are offering the best of Native Applications and Web technology at your users fingertips. Build a fast and scalable web application.

infoData.caption: native in the browser
infoData.title: Somewhere in between a website and an app
infoData.subTitle: Progressive Web Applications are great for when you want to move web-apps to mobile devices. Jamstack approach to PWA helped us get the best performance with low costs of build and great scalability.

more.content: Want to find out more about what PWAs are ?

data.title: Mobile experience
data.content: PWAs deliver native experience in the browser without the need to download an app. Plus they create a rich, capable user experience, even when the user is offline.

data.title: One development
data.content: Donâ€™t bother building many platforms for different systems and devices. Save money instead - PWAs bridges the gap between websites and mobile apps.

data.title: Scalability
data.content: PWAs are great for moving web apps to mobile devices. The serverless architecture scales automatically as your user base or usage increases.

data.title: Great performance
data.content: By cache site assets, you get an incredibly fast native mobile platform feel with many of the benefits of a web app, in your browser.

ctaInfo.content: Increase convertion rate by moving your store to digital.
